attributes.action: Regulations in beauty industries for Botox
attributes.additional_details: Make amendments to the current regulations for asthetics consultations for Botox
attributes.background: I want the new regulations to be reviewed about face to face consultations

rejection.details:
We are not clear what action you are seeking from Parliament and the UK Government. 

In Scotland this issue is devolved to the Scottish Parliament, which also has a petitions system which you can access here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/petitions/check
